mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_dorm_bed WHERE room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY bed_number
SELECT * FROM t_dorm_bed WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND bed_status = 1 ORDER BY bed_number
SELECT * FROM t_dorm_bed WHERE current_resident_id = #{residentId} AND bed_status = 2
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_dorm_bed (room_id, bed_number, bed_status, current_resident_id, allocation_time) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{bedNumber}, #{bedStatus}, #{currentResidentId}, #{allocationTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_dorm_bed SET bed_status = #{bedStatus}, current_resident_id = #{residentId}, allocation_time = CASE WHEN #{bedStatus} = 2 THEN NOW() ELSE NULL END WHERE bed_id = #{bedId}
